text: Leningrad Cowboys Go America is a 1989 Finnish-Swedish comedy movie directed by Aki Kaurismäki and starring Matti Pellonpää, Kari Väänänen, Sakke Järvenpää, Sakari Kuosmanen, Nicky Tesco. It was distributed by Finnkino and was followed by 1994 sequel Leningrad Cowboys Meet Moses. ==Other websites== * * Category:1989 comedy movies Category:1980s road movies Category:Finnish movies Category:Swedish comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Aki Kaurismäki Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in Mexico Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies set in Tennessee Category:Movies set in Mississippi Category:Movies set in Louisiana
title: Leningrad Cowboys Go America
